original: Åberg, Thorsten Gustaf, fil. mag., teol. kand., folkhögskolerektor, Vessi-gebro, f. 14/7/04 i Motala av bokför. Axel Th. A. o. Dorotea Karlsson. G. 34 m. handarb:- o. skolkökslär. Birgit Lindahl. Barn: Gunnar f. 36, Birgitta 37, Lennart 42, Torbjörn 46, — Stud:-ex. 23, fil. mag. 26, teol. kand. 36. Res. m. skolöv :styr. stip. t. Danm. f. stud. av folkhögsk :und:visn. 27, i statl. uppdr. t. Danm. 47, m. Knut Kjellbergs stip. t. Finl. f. stud. av folkbild-n:verks. 46, på inbj. av sv. folktings-fullm. t. Finl. 47. Lär. v. folkhögsk. i Molkom^ 26-29, v. Upps. h. folksk. 29-36’, v. tekn. sk. i Upps. 31-33, vik. adj. v. Motala h. a. 1. 33, v. Malmö h. flick-lärov. 34, rektor v. Hall. 1. folkhögsk. å Katrineberg fr. 35. Förste kur. v. Östg. nat. i Upps. 30-32, förest, f. Hall. folkbildn :iförb. fr. 35, ordf. o. förest, f. Alfshögs föreläsn :fören. fr. 35, ordf. i Årstads o. Faurås hemb:fören. 36-42, i Katrinebergs elevförb. fr. 36, led. av styr. f. Hall. föreläsn :förb. fr. 39, ordf. i Alfshögs komm:fullm. ifr. 39, i folksk :styr. 40-47, i kyrkostämma fr. 40, led. av kyrkoråd fr. 40, länsomb. f. folkberedsk. 40-45, sekr. i Bildnrförb. riksorg. 43-46, led. av styr. f. Falken- bergsavd. av fören. Norden fr. 43, seikr. 43-45, v. ordf. i Hall ikrets. av fören. Norden fr. 45, v. ordf. i Frimurarfören. Medborgarsk. fr. 46, led. av 46 års skolkomm. expertråd o. folkhöig-skideleg. fr. 46, led. av styr. f. Hall. herabiförb. fr. 46, v. ordf. i Mell. Hall. hemb:fören. fr. 46, v. ordf. i Sv:es kyrkl. studiförb. fr. 47, led. av styr. f. Falkenbergsort. djursk ifören. fr. 47 m. m. Skr.: Rel :k;unsk. (tills. m. Gustav Swahn, 44), Sv. språket (tiills. m. Th. Lindeli, 47), sju stud:planer (46-4S). Red. Folkbildn :ser. fr. 43, red. tills. m. Fre dr. Ström o. Alb. Sand-klef Hall., kustland., gränsland., framtidslandet (45), red. två lärimatr. (39, 47), red. tills. m. N. Roth 100 skådespel, urv. f. amatörteat. (48), led. av redikomm. f. skr:ser. Idé o. samhälle.
translated: Åberg, Thorsten Gustaf, M.A., B.A. (theology), folk high school principal, Vessi-gebro, born on 14/7/04 in Motala to registered booker Axel Th. A. and Dorotea Karlsson. Married in 1934 to Birgit Lindahl, a crafts and home economics teacher. Children: Gunnar (born 1936), Birgitta (born 1937), Lennart (born 1942), Torbjörn (born 1946). Passed exams in 1923, became a M.A. in 1926, and a B.A. in theology in 1936. Traveled with a scholarship from the school board to Denmark for studying folk high school education in 1927, got a state assignment in Denmark in 1947, received Knut Kjellberg's scholarship for studying popular education in Finland in 1946, and was invited by the Swedish People's Parliament representative to Finland in 1947. Taught at the folk high school in Molkom from 1926-1929, at Uppsala primary school from 1929-1936, at the technical school in Uppsala from 1931-1933, as a substitute teacher at Motala higher girls' school in 1933, at Malmö higher girls' school in 1934, and became the principal of Hall. 1. folk high school in Katrineberg from 1935. First curator of Östg. nat. in Uppsala from 1930-1932, became the director of Hall. folkbildn :iförb. (Halland Popular Educational Association) from 1935, chairman and director of Alfshög's lecture association from 1935, chairman of Årstads and Faurås home care association from 1936-1942, chairman of Katrineberg's student association from 1936, member of the board for Halland's lecture association from 1939, chairman of Alfshög's municipal council from 1939, member of the school board from 1940-1947, member of the church assembly from 1940, member of the church board from 1940, county commissioner for civil defense from 1940-1945, secretary in the National Association of Photography from 1943-1946, member of the board for the Falkenberg branch of the Norden association from 1943, secretary from 1943-1945, vice chairman of the Hall i district of the Norden association from 1945, vice chairman of the Freemasons' association Catena from 1944, member of the 1944 popular education investigation, secretary of the Popular Education Association in Stockholm from 1945, vice chairman of the Student Association Medborgarsk. from 1946, member of the 1946 school commission expert council and folkhigh school delegation, member of the board for Halland purebred livestock association from 1946, vice chairman of the middle Hall. home care association from 1946, vice chairman of Sweden's church study association from 1947, member of the board for the Falkenberg local animal welfare association from 1947, etc. Writings: Religious knowledge (together with Gustav Swahn, 1944), The Swedish language (together with Th. Lindeli, 1947), seven study plans (1946-1948). Editor of the Popular Education series from 1943, co-editor with Fre dr. Ström and Alb. Sandklef of Hall., coastal, borderland, future land (1945), co-editor of two textbooks (1939, 1947), co-editor with N. Roth of 100 plays, selected for amateur theater (1948), member of the editorial committee for the series Idea and Society.
